cyclone.name: HANNA
cyclone.current_location: about 190 miles E of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving west then west-southwest toward the south-central Texas coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge watches from Baffin Bay to Sargent, TX
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warning Baffin Bay to Mesquite Bay; Tropical-storm warning Mouth of Rio Grande to Baffin Bay and Mesquite Bay to San Luis Pass
weather_observation.impacted_coast: South and central Texas coast from Rio Grande to Sargent; upper Texas/Louisiana coast affected mainly by rain and surf
weather_observation.wind: Light to moderate gusty winds possible; tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (≤34 kt probability only 3%)
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge of 1–2 ft possible near Sabine Pass and Galveston Bay
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–5 inches of rain with locally higher amounts; risk of localized flash flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along the upper Texas coast
